version_description:
1. Added panorama stitching function;
2. The focus adjustment will occur when the camera is switched before and after the repair.
2. It is necessary to not support zoom when fixing the panorama, and set the zoom ratio to 1x;
3 side menu layout effect please adjust according to UI design;
4 repair memory capacity is not updated in real time;
5. Fix for the first time into the camera, then switch to the front camera, the screen will be black off;
6. In the face tracking mode, the face suddenly disappears and the head will rotate in one direction.
7. Add white balance and image optimization features.

1. Added panorama stitching function;
2. The focus adjustment will occur when the camera is switched before and after the repair.
2. It is necessary to not support zoom when fixing the panorama, and set the zoom ratio to 1x;
3 side menu layout effect please adjust according to UI design;
4 repair memory capacity is not updated in real time;
5. Fix for the first time into the camera, then switch to the front camera, the screen will be black off;
6. In the face tracking mode, the face suddenly disappears and the head will rotate in one direction.
7. Add white balance and image optimization features.

1. Increase support for Japanese；
2. Increase time-lapse photography；
3. Repair known bugs。

1. After adding a new album image, you can slide the preview left and right;
2. Image/video sharing;
3. Album interface menu option to add icons to optimize the camera interface;
4. Take a photo countdown tone;
5. Manual mode interface optimization.

1. Add language switching in APP;
2. Added camera auto focus;
3. The audio and video generated after the video is recorded is not synchronized;
4. Some mobile phones have a ribbon problem in the preview interface;
5. After the video is recorded, drag the scroll bar to preview the card/video playback jam;
6. Update French and English translations.

1. Fix the problem of object crash when recording and recording;
2. Improve the stability of the app.
Fix known issues and improve app usability。
Fix known issues and improve app usability。
Fix known issues and improve app usability。
Fix known issues and improve app usability。
Fix known issues and improve app usability。

1. Fix the bug of switching the shooting mode under the beauty and filter function. 
2. Fix the bug that will switch to video mode automatically after turning on the beauty and filter and then close it. 
3. Solve the problem that you can switch the video mode when taking photos.
4. Solved the problem of file browsing, the back icon and status bar overlapping.
5. Bluetooth and four status icons background replacement, face tracking icon position adjustment, camera layout optimization.
1. Solved the problem of horizontal and vertical screen compatibility.

1. Added scene shooting mode Mad Dog;
2. Added Vlog shooting mode;
3. Fix some known bugs.

1、新增：Vlog模式-智能跟随功能；
2、新增：Vlog模式-全景环拍功能；
3、修复已知bug。

1. Fixed known crash issues
2. Fix the focus problem
3. Fixed some known bugs
修复闪退问题。

1、处理了首页、相机页的界面优化；
2、解决了相机页部分图标响应延迟的问题；
3、修复了自动校准中程序卡死的问题;
4、修复了编辑功能的闪退问题；
5、修复了已知bug。
修复已知bug；

1、优化了直播人脸跟拍功能的跟拍速度；
2、修复了人脸跟踪功能的多人脸场景下识别不准确的问题；
3、适配了首页横屏；
4、修复了已知bug；
修复了已知bug.
